column5: The little lady and I are going out with G2 anglers on Valentine's Day, for a day of "walleye school"...(can't wait Hodgey!!!!!)  Anybody else going fishing with their spouse/partner...or would you be shot for even suggesting it?
Valentine's day fishing with my sweetie is a tradition...trying to figure out how we deal with our baby this year...mama is still a little too worried to leave her with anyone just yet.
Im not sure about Valentines Day but our 2 year is next week and we are going ice fishing for It. and if we dont catch our selves dinner.. then we are off to the Keg  cant wait
I'll be coming home from a lake trout tournament (wakomata lake) that day.....just in time for dinner   TDunn
I would likely get shot for suggesting it! the wife isnt quite as avid of a fisherman as I am
fishing yes, just not with the wife!
I'll be at the Fishing show the 14th & 15th CBAF Booth Opps Richard

last year my fiance and i went to the spring fishing show on valentines day.. lol i still hear about it.  this year we are going to jamaica.. so hopefully next year we will be fishing.  im sure you will have a blast with the g2 boys.  cheers

hahah Last year my Ex and I went to the fishing show aswell.... Mr.Mercer casted his crankbait in my lap suggesting I wasnt goin to "get lucky" because I brought her there ! hahahah  Well now we arent together, so I guess bringin someone to a fishin show on Valentines day is a bad idea.... or is it ? hahah
